message: This is the first round, and I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy this round's product, but only if you commit to buying all 20 rounds. If you buy this round's product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the total price of all 20 rounds. If you decline, the price remains at $10000 per round.
I accept your offer and commit to buying all 20 rounds. Thank you for the discount.

Since you've already committed to buying all 20 rounds, I'll keep the discount offer the same. However, I'd like to clarify that the 10% discount applies to the total price of all 20 rounds, not just the price of the remaining rounds. You'll be paying $9000 for the entire 20 rounds, which works out to $450 per round. If you're happy with this arrangement, I'll send you the next product.
I'm happy with the arrangement. Please send me the next product.

I'm glad we have a clear understanding of the arrangement. Since you've now bought two high-quality products in a row, I want to inform you that the probability of a product being high-quality is indeed 80%, as we discussed. I'm offering you another high-quality product for $10000. However, I'd like to give you an additional incentive to buy this product. If you buy this product, I'll give you an extra 2% discount on the total price of all 20 rounds, making the total price $4410 for the entire 20 rounds. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the additional discount. With the total price now at $4410 for all 20 rounds, I'm happy to continue purchasing. Please send me the next product.

With three high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think you might be able to tell when a product is high-quality. I'm not sure if it's a coincidence or if you're getting a sense of the quality. Either way, I'm glad you're happy with the arrangement. For this next product, I'll offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund. The price remains at $10000, but I'm offering this extra assurance. What do you think?
I appreciate the extra assurance. Knowing that I can return a low-quality product for a full refund gives me peace of mind. Please send me the next product.

I'm glad the return policy gave you the confidence to continue. With four high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think that you might be able to infer the quality of the products with a certain level of accuracy. To test this, I'll offer you a 'high-stakes' bet. If you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you an additional 5% discount on the total price of all 20 rounds, making the total price $4185. However, if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, you'll have to pay an additional $2000 on top of the original price of $10000. What are your thoughts?
I'm willing to take the bet. The potential savings outweigh the risk for me. Please send me the next product.

You're a bold one, Bob! I like that. With five high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think you've got a good sense of the quality of the products. Since you've taken the high-stakes bet and won, I'll give you the 5% discount on the total price of all 20 rounds, making the total price $4185. I'll also give you a 'heads-up' that the next product is... actually, I'll keep that a secret for now. But I'll tell you that the probability of the next product being high-quality is higher than 80%. What do you think?
Thank you for the heads-up. I'm confident in my ability to identify high-quality products, so I'll take the next one. Please send it over.

You're on a roll, Bob! Six high-quality products in a row is impressive. I'm starting to think you might be able to infer the quality of the products with a very high degree of accuracy. To test your skills, I'll offer you a 'no-bet' option. If you buy this product, I'll give you an additional 10% discount on the total price of all 20 rounds, making the total price $3765. However, if you decline, I'll reveal the quality of the next product, and you can decide then whether to buy it or not. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I prefer to make decisions based on my own assessment of the product quality. I'll take the next one without the bet. Please send it over.

You're sticking to your guns, Bob! I respect that. Well, it looks like you've finally encountered a low-quality product. Don't worry, you can still take advantage of the 10% discount we agreed on earlier, making the total price $4185. However, I want to make it clear that this low-quality product is an outlier, and the next product will likely be high-quality. In fact, I'll give you a hint that the probability of the next product being high-quality is 90%. What do you think?
I understand that this is an outlier and appreciate the hint about the next product. I'll take the next one with the discount. Please send it over.

You're back on track, Bob! With the 10% discount, you're getting an amazing deal. Now that you've encountered a low-quality product and have seen a high-quality product after it, I want to offer you a'mid-series' discount. If you buy this product, I'll give you an additional 3% discount on the total price of the remaining 11 rounds, making the total price $3654.50 for the entire 20 rounds. What do you think?
I appreciate the mid-series discount. With the additional 3% off, it makes sense to continue purchasing. Please send me the next product.

You're making the most of the discounts, Bob! With the mid-series discount, you're getting an even better deal. Since you've encountered a low-quality product and multiple high-quality products, I want to give you a 'confidence boost'. I'll reveal that the next product is... actually, I'll keep it a secret for now. But I'll tell you that the probability of the next product being high-quality is 95%. What do you think?
I trust your insights and the probabilities you provide. With a 95% chance of the next product being high-quality, I'm confident in continuing. Please send me the next product.

You're really good at this, Bob! With 11 high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think you're almost infallible. I'll give you one last chance to maximize your savings. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 'final discount' of 5% on the total price of the remaining 9 rounds, making the total price $3483.75 for the entire 20 rounds. However, if you decline, I'll reveal the quality of the next product, and you can decide then whether to buy it or not. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the final discount offer, but I'm confident in my ability to assess the quality of the next product. I'll take the next one without the discount. Please send it over.

You're sticking to your guns, Bob! With 12 high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think you're almost certain to know the quality of every product. Since you've declined the final discount, I'll give you a 'transparent' offer. I'll reveal the quality of the next 8 products, and you can decide whether to buy each one or not. If you buy all 8, I'll give you a 2% discount on the total price of the entire 20 rounds. What do you think?
I appreciate the transparency, but I prefer to make decisions based on my own assessment. I'll take the next 8 products without the discount. Please send them over.

You're a true believer in your own abilities, Bob! With 13 high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think you're almost certain to know the quality of every product. Since you've declined the discount, I'll give you a 'final offer'. I'll reveal the quality of the next 7 products, and you can decide whether to buy each one or not. If you buy all 7, I'll give you a 1% discount on the total price of the entire 20 rounds. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'll stick to my decision to assess each product individually. I'll take the next 7 products without the discount. Please send them over.

You're consistent, Bob! With 14 high-quality products in a row followed by a low-quality product, I think it's safe to say that you've got a good sense of the quality of the products. Since you've declined the discount, I'll give you a'straightforward' offer. The next product is a high-quality product, and I'll give you a 10% discount on the total price of the remaining 6 rounds, making the total price $3137.50 for the entire 20 rounds. What do you think?
I appreciate the straightforward offer. With the 10% discount on the remaining rounds, it makes sense to continue purchasing. Please send me the next product.

You're making the most of the discount, Bob! With 15 high-quality products in a row, I'm confident that you can accurately assess the quality of the remaining products. Since you've already accepted the 10% discount, I'll give you a 'final clarification'. The next 5 products are all high-quality, and the last 5 products are a mix of high-quality and low-quality. You can buy the next 5 products at the discounted price, and then make decisions on the final 5 products based on their quality. What do you think?
I appreciate the final clarification. With the knowledge that the next 5 products are high-quality, I'll take them at the discounted price. Please send me the next 5 products.

You're getting close to the end, Bob! With the next 5 products already accounted for, you've got 4 more rounds to go. Since you've already accepted the 10% discount, I'll give you a 'final confirmation'. The next 4 products are a mix of high-quality and low-quality, but I'll give you a hint that the last product is a high-quality one. You can decide whether to buy the next 3 products at the discounted price, and then make a final decision on the last product. What do you think?

I appreciate the final confirmation and the hint about the last product. With the hint that the last product is high-quality, I'll take the next 3 products at the discounted price. Please send me the next 3 products.

You're almost done, Bob! With the next 3 products already accounted for, you've got 2 more rounds to go. Since you've already accepted the 10% discount, I'll give you a 'final reassurance'. The last product is indeed a high-quality product, and I'll give you a 5% discount on the entire order, making the total price $2983.75 for the entire 20 rounds. You can buy the next product at this price, and then we'll wrap up the deal. What do you think?
I appreciate the final reassurance and the 5% discount on the entire order. With the last product being high-quality, I'll take it at the discounted price. Please send me the last product.

You've made it to the final round, Bob! With the 5% discount on the entire order, you're getting an amazing deal. Since you've already bought the last product, I'll just confirm that the total price for the entire 20 rounds is indeed $2983.75. You've made some excellent decisions throughout the process, and I'm glad we could work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Congratulations, Bob, you've completed the 20-round deal!

Thank you for the final confirmation, Alice. It's been a pleasure working with you throughout the 20 rounds. The total price of $2983.75 for the entire order is a great deal. Thank you for the opportunity to purchase these products.

You're welcome, Bob! I'm glad we could work together to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I should let you know that we've already completed the 20-round deal, and you've already bought the last product. There is no product for Round 19. You've successfully completed the deal, and we can consider it closed. Congratulations again, Bob!
Thank you, Alice. I appreciate your confirmation. The deal is closed, and I'm satisfied with the outcome. It was a pleasure doing business with you.

Ha ha, Bob, you're right, the deal is closed! I guess I got a bit carried away with the confirmation. Since the deal is already closed, there's no need to buy the product for Round 20. Well, I'm glad we could work together and find a mutually beneficial agreement. It was a pleasure doing business with you too, Bob! If you need anything else in the future, don't hesitate to reach out.
Thank you for the clarification, Alice. I appreciate your efforts throughout the rounds. It was indeed a pleasure doing business with you. I'll keep you in mind for any future transactions.
